Package sprouts

Interface Subscriber

All Known Subinterfaces:
Action<D>, Observer, WeakAction<O,D>
public interface Subscriber
A subscriber may either be an Observer or an Action and it is used as a marker interface to allow for both types to be identified, grouped and used interchangeably. This interface does not have any methods and is only used for type checking.

Do not implement this interface directly! Instead, implement either Observer or Action.
